their.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: belonging to or connected with people or things that have already been mentioned
their.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: They washed their faces and went to bed.
The twins spend all their time together.
People had moved back into their own homes.
their.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: used when talking about someone who may be male or female, to avoid saying ‘his or her’
their.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Everyone is free to express their own opinion.
Each student will have their own course-work folder.
